meanings.definition: To fill with sudden and overpowering surprise or wonder; amaze.
meanings.sent1: The magician's trick astonishes the audience every time.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected plot twist in the movie astonishes viewers.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog astonishes everyone at the park.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for painting astonishes me like a burst of fireworks.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset astonishes with its vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: To strike with sudden wonder or surprise, as being extraordinary.
meanings.sent1: The grandeur of the mountains astonishes hikers on the trail.
meanings.sent2: The speed of the cheetah astonishes scientists studying wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The size of the cake astonishes the birthday girl at her party.
meanings.sent4: His generosity astonishes me like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The complexity of the human brain astonishes with its intricate workings.
